resources.string:
ABDR

 Is an application; that will enable you to be

 released from all the troubles of check-in process

 at the airport, by providing a trusted driver to do

 that for you, while you track his full path to the 

 airport,and you receive luggage barcodes while

 you are home,and when you are ready you head 

 to the boarding gate directly.

"-Luggage must be within the specified weight range.

" "-If luggage exceeds the allowed weight range, extra fees will be collected from the passenger bank account.

" "-Any dangerous luggage shouldn't be carried on a flight.

" "-Cancellation is available 24 hours before booking time. 

" "-Passenger must commit with the appointment date and time."

"1. Luggage must be within the specified weight range by the airline.

" "2. If luggage exceeds the allowed weight range, extra fees will be collected from the passenger bank account.

" "3. Any dangerous luggage shouldn't be carried on a flight.

" "4. Be sure you reserve the appropriate car for your luggage.

" "5. Passenger has to be serious and must commit with the appointment date and time.

" "6. Your bank account must be valid.

" "7. Fees will be withdrawn from your bank account right after your luggage has been checked in.

" "8. Feel free to contact us through our Complaints page if you have any problem.

" "9. In case of driver delay (15 minutes after you appointment), you'll have 10% discount.

" "10.Maximum driver waiting time is 20-30 minutes.

" "11.Cancellation one day prior your appointment is preferred.

"
